scripts.build-examples: npm run build -w examples/react -w examples/vue -w examples/vanilla -w examples/svelte
scripts.build-website: rm -rf website/dist && mkdir website/dist && cp -R examples/react/dist website/dist/react && cp -R examples/vue/dist website/dist/vue && cp -R examples/vanilla/dist website/dist/vanilla && cp -R examples/svelte/dist website/dist/svelte && cd website && npm run build && cp -R public/* dist/.
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run publint && lerna publish
scripts.pub-recovery: npm run build && npm run publint && lerna publish from-package
scripts.check-all: run-s build typecheck lint format:check publint
